-- Megatron / Switchblade --

Megatron's irritation has dwindled a bit since he woke up, but -- as 
Switchblade would find out -- not very much at all. He growls 
softly, as he taps his fingers impatiently. Where was Switchblade? 
That miserable infidel would come to know just how much pain he 
could suffer for such an slight upon his mighty self.

Wrath. Megatron chuckles to himself, "Feel my wrath." The Pred 
leader waits for Switchblade to arrive; he was suspiciously late, 
but Megatron knew he would show up.

----------------------------

Switchblade's eyes are raised when Destructor asks him politely to 
go to the control room. "Politeness... out of a Predacon... are you 
sure that you are thinkin straight?" He looks up at the bigger 
bot. "Besides, there's no point in being polite, Megatron is 
definately going to give me a warm welcome when I arrive at the 
control room." A sarcastic lilt appears in his voice as he nears the 
end of his last words. Unbeknownst to the Predacons present, 
Switchblade was talking to cover up his fear, and to delay for some 
time.

"Blah blah blah Perceptor, until I hear something worth listening 
too from your sorry mouth," grumbles the smaller bot, as he starts 
the painfully long journey to the control room. He brushes past 
Destructor as he leaves the room.

-----------------------------

Switchblade walks quietly down the corridor of the Pred ship, 
sorting out his thoughs, and deciding how he would play out the 
incident. Megatron was obviously unhappy, and would likely do 
something... damaging... to Switchblade. Though, if planned 
properly, he figures that he should be able to worm his way out of 
disfavour. <I'll have to access the security cameras in the storage 
bay... they will show something interesting, probably enough to free 
me from an untimely demise.>

He rounds the corner, and poks his head into the room. He is 
immediately noticed by Megatron, who without looking at him, bekons 
for him to enter.

Switchblade sighs inwardly, and enters. He strols nochalantly across 
the room, and sits himself down in one of the control room chairs, 
then looks over at the Pred leader.

Megatron smiles, showing teeth, and making no effort to mask his 
irritation. "Switchblade... It seems you have a problem."

"Heh, I thought that you might have something to say... would this 
perhaps be about the little incident with the artifa--" Switchblade 
is cut off by Megatron.

"Yes..." says Megatron as his eyes narrow, "You were supposed to 
determine the usefullness of the artifacts, then take them 
outside... What happened?" Demands the Pred leader.

"Well..." mumbles Switchblade, "I'm, err, not 100% sure on that one. 
You see, I was looking at the pieces, and trying to put them 
together. Quite accidentally, I managed to fit them together. About 
that time, I suddenly blanked out, and woke up to find myself on the 
ground, artifact in hand, and a impressively large slashed hole in 
the side of the storage bay wall, looks like it might have been 
melted." He finishes sheepishly, "Lets check the security vids." 
before Megatron can say something that might decide his fate.

Switchblade hops up, and walks over to the security panel. His 
fingers blur as he types and presses buttons on the console. A holo 
display appears in the middle of the room, and starts to play a 
recording of the storage bay incident.

It comes to the part when Switchblade blacked out, and Megatron 
watches the holo Switchblade go totally limp, and them raise the 
artifact over his head. Well, it was more like the artifact raised 
Switchblade. Then a bright light speared outward from the artifact, 
destroying the overloading the camera optics, effectively disabling 
that camera it gets repaired.

Switchblade smiles triuphantly to himself, knowing that he's all but 
proved that he wasn't going against Megatron...

Turning back to Megatron, he is about ot say something, shen his jaw 
drops, as he finds himself looking into the large barrel of 
Megatron's plasma cannon. "Uhh..." <I guess I did still screw up...>

Megatron smiles taking the thoughts from Switchblade's mind, "You 
still screwed up, and must pay the prices." He fires the cannon at 
the minibot. The results are devastating... for Switchblade. He 
loses his right arm, leg, and his head immediately, and there is 
significant damage to his body as the blast smashes it against the 
far wall.

"Fool..." says Megatron to himself as he opens a commlink to 
Inferno, "Inferno, get over here into the control room, and clean up 
this mess... Perceptor, begin repairs in the storage bay.

He walks over to Switchblade's destroyed form, and picks up the 
single pieces of artifact. "This doesn't look like the thing in the 
security vid... maybe I should have let him live for a bit longer..."
